jsx.ui.dd
Class Resizable

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.Source
              jsx.ui.Widget
                  jsx.ui.dd.Draggable
                      jsx.ui.dd.Resizable
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnDragMove, OnDragStart, OnDragStop
public class Resizable
extends Draggable
implements OnDragMove

A base class for widgets that can be resized by touch handles.

A Resizable widget is a draggable wrapper that makes its underlying HTML element resizable in accordance with a Mouse wrapper widget to which it listens mouse events.

A Resizable widget is Configurable and is also an event source which fires Widget.Event events.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Constructor Detail

Resizable

protected Resizable(ObjectLike ini)

A typical constructor that constructs a wrapper widget of this type and forces constructors of subclasses to pass initializing data.

This constructor invokes the typical constructor of the superclass passing the specified initializing object as the argument. The typical constructor of the superclass attaches the resizable widget being created to the mouse widget if specified.

Parameters:
ini - The initializing object.
Since:
1.0

Resizable

public Resizable(Component e,
                 int dir)

Constructs a draggable widget that wraps a specified component and makes it resizable in the specified direction by the configured touch handle to which the newly constructed widget are listening mouse events.

This constructor invokes the typical constructor of this class passing an new initializing object as the argument and setting the configurable property Widget.COMPONENT to the argument component, DIR to the specified resizing direction.

Parameters:
e - The component to be wrapped by the wrapper widget being created.
dir - Specifies in which direction this resizable widget is allowed to resize its underlying component. Possible values for this argument are:
  • N: Only the north border is allowed to move for resizing.
  • S: Only the south border is allowed to move for resizing.
  • E: Only the east border is allowed to move for resizing.
  • W: Only the west border is allowed to move for resizing.
  • SE: Only the south-east corner is allowed to move for resizing.
  • SW: Only the south-west corner is allowed to move for resizing.
  • NE: Only the north-east corner is allowed to move for resizing.
  • NW: Only the north-west corner is allowed to move for resizing.
Since:
1.0
Method Detail

onEvent

public void onEvent(DragStart evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

This method calls the method Draggable.press(Draggable, DragStart) to prepare for resizing and then enters the dragging mode if it is not started.

Specified by:
onEvent in interface OnDragStart
Overrides:
onEvent in class Draggable
Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0

onEvent

public void onEvent(DragMove evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

This method resizes the resizable widget or its ghost component accordingly and fires a default Style event from underlying component to notify a necessary layout.

Specified by:
onEvent in interface OnDragMove
Overrides:
onEvent in class Draggable
Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0

onEvent

public void onEvent(DragStop evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

This method ends resizing if it is in a dragging mode and resizes the underlying component by applying a style object created with the cached position data and the return result of a call to the method resize(double, double, int). It executes an Animation event, with the style object that has just been created, or a default Style event from the underlying component when execution of an animation event fails.

Specified by:
onEvent in interface OnDragStop
Overrides:
onEvent in class Draggable
Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0

resize

protected static final ObjectLike resize(double w,
                                         double h,
                                         int limit)

Creates and returns a style object of resizing data with the specified dimensions and limitation.

A subclass may also call this method to meet its particular needs.

Parameters:
w - The X dimension.
h - The Y dimension.
limit - Limits a dimension in an axis direction. See Draggable.LIMIT for possible values.
Returns:
The created style object.
Since:
1.0
